provenance.name: Glasgow District Council, Pollok House
provenance.note: Acquired from Blake at an unknown date (1806 or later) by Thomas Butts; inherited in 1845 by Thomas Butts, Jr.; sold from the Butts collection, Foster and Son auction, London, 29 June 1853, lot 88 (£6.16s.6d. to William Stirling-Maxwell); by inheritance to John Stirling Maxwell in 1878; Mrs. A. Maxwell Macdonald; given by Macdonald in 1967 to the Corporation of Glasgow (now Glasgow District Council) and housed at Pollok House, Glasgow.
